title: Ariel II
brief_description: Deals with the history of the second international satellite and how it was developed and placed into orbit by American and British scientists in an effort to gain new knowledge about the structure of the universe. It covers research, experiments and development in Britain and assembly, testing and launching in the U.S. Produced for N.A.S.A. No other credits available.
